name: Remote Controller: Lawn Mower
description:
In this game you will mow the lawn. You accumulate Lawn Bucks for mowing things your supposed to (long grass, gross bugs). You will lose Lawn Bucks for mowing things your not supposed to (cut grass, flowers). Avoid stumps and rocks, or else you'll need to get a new mower. Once you reach the Lawn Bucks threshold necessary to pass the level, touch the yellow flag to move onto the next level.

Use the arrow keys to guide your mower, its self powered so you will just choose direction. Mow lawns, get paid, hit the next lawn.

Features 18 levels and 3 difficulties.
